Detailed Description

This class is describes the flare which is part of the lens effect.

Flares can have secondary flares, such as coronas.

void FlareData::clipDepth ( float  d  ) 

See also:
clipDepth

float FlareData::clipDepth (  )  const

This method sets the clip depth of the flare.

The clip depth is the amount the clip position of the flare is scaled by; useful for multi-flare effects, like sun through a telephoto lens

void FlareData::draw ( const Vector4 &  clipPos,
float  alphaStrength,
float  scale,
uint32  lensColour 
) const

This method draws a square mesh, using a given material.

Assumes rendering states have been setup correctly.

Parameters:
clipPos The position in clip space of the flare
alphaStrength The intensity of the alpha channel.
scale The scale to apply to the flare's opacity (alpha)
lensColour The Colour to apply to the flare.

void FlareData::size ( float  s  ) 

See also:
size

float FlareData::size (  )  const

This method returns the size, in clip space, of the lens effect Note that a lens effect doesn't really have a size, just a width and height.

Size() returns the larger of the two.
